metadata.feature_description: Apply workflows to files and assets, managing their approval process through workflow states.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access file workflow tab and view workflow history

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Assets > Images folder
steps.expected: Assets panel opens showing files and folders
steps.actual: Assets panel opened successfully showing Images folder contents

steps.action: Locate file with Draft status badge
steps.expected: Draft file should be visible with status indicator
steps.actual: Found subfolder_upload_test.txt with Draft badge visible

steps.action: Click edit icon on draft file to open properties panel
steps.expected: File properties panel opens with tabs
steps.actual: File properties panel opened showing DETAILS, VERSIONING, and WORKFLOW tabs

steps.expected: Workflow tab shows workflow state information and history
steps.actual: Workflow tab displayed showing Submit/Discard buttons and workflow history table with entries for State Initiated and Workflow Started actions

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Apply workflow to folder - change workflow settings

steps.action: Hover over folder in Assets panel
steps.expected: Action icons should appear on hover
steps.actual: Edit, move, copy, download, delete icons appeared on folder hover

steps.action: Click edit icon to open folder properties
steps.expected: Folder properties panel opens with workflow settings
steps.actual: Folder properties panel opened showing DETAILS and PERMISSIONS tabs, with Workflow dropdown and Versioning toggle

steps.action: Open Workflow dropdown to see available options
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed options: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow, Test & <> "Special" Chars!

steps.expected: Workflow selection updates and handles pending items
steps.actual: System showed Pending Items section with Publish All/Discard All options for files with running workflows in the folder

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Submit workflow state (Draft to Ready for Review)

steps.action: On Workflow tab of draft file, click Submit button
steps.expected: Workflow state should change from Draft to next state
steps.actual: Success notification displayed: 'The operation has been processed successfully.' File status changed from Draft to Ready For Review

steps.expected: File should show Ready For Review badge instead of Draft
steps.actual: File thumbnail now shows 'Ready For Review' badge confirming successful state transition

steps.action: Open workflow tab for file in Ready For Review state
steps.expected: Workflow tab should show Publish and Reject buttons
steps.actual: Workflow tab displayed Publish and Reject buttons, and updated workflow history showing Draft Completed and State Initiated for Ready For Review

steps.action: Click Publish button to complete workflow
steps.expected: Workflow should complete and file should be published
steps.actual: Success notification displayed: 'The operation has been processed successfully.' File no longer shows any workflow status badge - workflow completed and file is published

steps.action: View workflow history table on Workflow tab
steps.expected: Workflow history should show all state transitions
steps.actual: Workflow history table displayed with columns: Date, User, Action, Comment. Entries showed: State Initiated (Draft), Workflow Started (Content Approval), Draft Completed, State Initiated (Ready For Review)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Discard and Reject workflow buttons visibility

steps.action: Observe workflow action buttons in Draft state
steps.expected: Submit and Discard buttons should be available
steps.actual: Workflow tab showed Submit and Discard buttons for file in Draft state

steps.action: Observe workflow action buttons in Ready For Review state
steps.expected: Publish and Reject buttons should be available
steps.actual: Workflow tab showed Publish and Reject buttons for file in Ready For Review state

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Pending items handling when changing folder workflow

steps.action: Change workflow on folder with running workflows
steps.expected: System should prompt to handle pending items
steps.actual: System displayed 'Pending Items' section with 'Publish All' and 'Discard All' radio button options for handling files with running workflows before changing the folder workflow

observations: The Workflow Comment field label was visible but no text input field was found - comments may be entered via a different mechanism or this feature may not be fully implemented in the current UI
File clicking in Assets panel downloads the file instead of selecting it - user must use hover icons (edit icon) to access file properties
Workflow tab is only available for files, not for folders - folders have workflow settings in the Details tab
The blue X icon on files in workflow states appears to be a quick-discard action that could be used instead of opening the workflow tab
Workflow state transitions are properly tracked in the history table with timestamps, user info, actions, and comments
